issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fix round() logic to return positive zero when argument is zero
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11614](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11614). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Previously, round(0.0) and round(0.0, out_scale) were returning -0.0, with this patch round() returns +0.0
